product.name: Cordless Zebra Blinds for Windows - Customizable Light Filtering & Blackout Zebra Shades, Dual Layer Light Control Window Blinds, Easy Install Shade, Grey, Custom Size
product.description:
Ivory White Zebra Blinds create a serene and elegant atmosphere in any room. Perfect for living rooms, bedrooms, or offices, they offer excellent light control while maintaining privacy. The soft, neutral color enhances your décor, making your space feel brighter and more inviting.
Infuse your space with the sophisticated allure of Dusty Rose. Ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, or offices, these zebra blinds offer soft light filtration and privacy. The warm, muted pink hue creates a cozy and inviting vibe, seamlessly blending with modern and traditional décor alike.
The warm, sand-inspired hue of these zebra blinds creates a relaxed, natural feel. Ideal for living rooms with large windows or kitchens bathed in sunlight, they offer a perfect balance of light control and privacy. Their rich, neutral tone blends beautifully with wooden accents or neutral décor, giving your space a timeless, earthy charm.
These grey zebra blinds add a contemporary, refined touch to your home, offering a perfect balance of privacy and light control. The cool tone complements minimalist, industrial, or modern décor, creating a tranquil and stylish atmosphere. Perfect for living rooms, bedrooms, or offices, they provide a sleek, versatile solution for any room.
product.bullet_points:
• 【LINEN FABRICS】Our zebra roller shades for windows are crafted from high-quality, skin-friendly linen fabric, offering soft, diffused light to create a cozy, peaceful atmosphere in any room. The laser-cut fabric of zebra roller blind has no rough edges, and the natural linen fibers are odor-free, providing a comfortable and enjoyable environment.
• 【QUIET, STYLISH, AND LIGHT-CONTROLLED BLINDS】The fabric-wrapped valance and bottom rail not only enhance the zebra roller shades' aesthetic but also reduce operational noise for a quieter environment. This design prevents light leakage, offering better light control and privacy. The soft fabric touch adds comfort and durability, ensuring long-lasting performance.
• 【QUALITY YOU CAN COUNT ON】At MoDanCeQ, each zebra shade undergoes 10+ quality checks to meet the highest standards. We offer a free replacement for quality issues within a year (excluding user damage). With professional customer support, we ensure peace of mind with every purchase. After ordering, we'll email you within 24 hours to confirm window details.
• 【CORDLESS DESIGN】Our cordless zebra roller shades offer a user-friendly experience, allowing easy adjustment without touching the fabric. You can set blinds at any height, and they will stay in place until you make further adjustments. Perfect for households with pets or anyone seeking a hassle-free shading solution.
• 【CUSTOMIZE SIZE】INSIDE MOUNTING zebra roller shades require a minimum 2" window frame depth. custom windows blinds width need to be 1/4" less than window width, The length of the shade is equal to the length of the window. OUTSIDE MOUNTING zebra roller shades for windows need to be 4 inches wider and longer than window width and length for better coverage.If you can't find the size you need on the page, please contact us and we will give you for a custom solution.
